doc:
Beverly Long (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beverly_Long_(actress) 0 Beverly Powell Long (April 18, 1933 – May 8, 2014) was an American film and television actress, notable credits include Rebel Without a Cause (1955), Cavalcade of America (1957) and Father Knows Best (1958–1960). She later worked as a casting director with her own company Beverly Long Casting. Beverly_Powell_Long ( April_18_,_1933 – May_8_,_2014 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actress , notable_credits include Rebel Without a_Cause ( 1955 ) , Cavalcade of America ( 1957 ) and Father_Knows_Best ( 1958 – 1960 ) . She later worked as a_casting_director with her_own_company_Beverly_Long_Casting .
